name: renamerged-monorepo
description: PDF processing application with separated frontend and backend

scripts.dev: npm run setup:env && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: npm run setup:env && cd backend && npm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend: npm run setup:env && cd frontend && npm run dev
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend

author: Syahbandi
